text: Majdoul Tower (Arabic: برج مجدول) is a 50-story tower, still under construction, is a twisted skyscraper in Riyadh, Saudi Arabia, the eighth- tallest twisting tower in the world. ==See also== * List of twisted buildings * List of tallest buildings in Saudi Arabia ==References== Category:Towers in Saudi Arabia Category:Skyscrapers in Riyadh Category:Twisted buildings and structures Category:Tourist attractions in Riyadh
title: Al Majdoul Tower
